organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers Coach C. Vivian Stringer has landed one of the nation’s best-regarded recruiting classes. The sixth-ranked Scarlet Knights announced they have received five letters of intent from players for the 2008-9 season. The list was led by forward April Sykes of Crawford, Miss. Also committing to Rutgers were guard-forward Jasmine Dixon of Long Beach, Calif.; forward Chelsey Lee of Miami; forward Brooklyn Pope of Fort Worth; and guard Nikki Speed of Pasadena, Calif.
